quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Symbol and State
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, peach, abbreviation. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What does roe mean?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fish eggs

questions.question: The second-lightest noble gas has symbol, which is the same as the US postal abbreviation of this state.
The symbol of Manganese in the periodic table of elements is also the US Post Office abbreviation of this state.
SC is the US postal abbreviation of South Carolina as well as the symbol of this 21st element in the periodic table.
What term is used to describe a long scarf?
The symbol of Meitnerium in the periodic table is Mt, which corresponds to the abbreviation of this US state.
What is a lei?

options.text: A short rope used by cowboys

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hawaiian wreath

questions.question: What is the term used to describe an unscrupulous man in his dealings with women?
What is the name of the large African antelope much hunted by lions?
The US postal abbreviation of the Peach State is symbol of this chemical element.
Which of the following is a seed?
What is a fen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What is a wok?

options.text: A sieve used for draining fried foods
A fine fishing net used in tidal areas
A device used extensively by gold panners
A pan used in Oriental cooking

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A pan used in Oriental cooking

questions.question: The chemical element named after the creator of the first periodic table, Dmitri Mendeleev happens to be a US post office abbreviation of a state.  Name the capital of the state.
What is a koi?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A carp

quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Harry Potter Series and Series
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, rated, character. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the Harry Potter series, the teaching staff at Hogwarts School is rather small, with only one teacher for each subject, with a few substitutes and other miscellaneous staff.  Which of the following pairings of a teacher and a subject is incorrect?

options.text: Professor Slughorn-Defense Against The Dark Arts

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Professor Slughorn-Defense Against The Dark Arts

questions.question: Which of the following characters, featured in the Harry Potter series, is not related by blood to Sirius, who is a member of the pure-blood family the Blacks?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lucius Malfoy

questions.question: Which of the following creatures, depicted in the Harry Potter series, is not matched correctly with the type of beast he/she is?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Firenze - Phoenix

questions.question: TV character Jeff Miller had a dog named Lassie.
Which of the following characters in the Harry Potter series was never employed by the Ministry of Magic, that works to regulate the magical world in Britain?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gilderoy Lockhart

questions.question: In the Harry Potter series, wizards and witches are often categorized according to the magical abilities of their parents (i.e. Pure-Blood, Half-Blood, Muggle-Born).  Which of the following characters is not a Half-Blood (i.e. one magical parent, one non-magical parent)?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arthur Weasley

questions.question: In Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix, Harry and his friends form a secret group known as Dumbledores Army (DA)  when they are forced to teach themselves Defense Against the Dark Arts.  Which of the following students was not a member of the DA?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Sloper

questions.question: Which of the following characters from the Harry Potter series has never personally taught Defense Against the Dark Arts at Hogwarts?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mad-Eye Moody

questions.question: Which of the following characters from the Harry Potter series was not killed by Lord Voldemort or his Death Eaters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frank Longbottom

questions.question: Teenage love in the Harry Potter series becomes a major theme in books 4-6.  Which of the following romantic pairings never existed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cho Chang  Roger Davies

questions.question: Which of the following Weasleys from the Harry Potter series did not play Quidditch for the Gryffindor house team?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Percy Weasley

questions.question: Which of the following characters from the Harry Potter series never served as headmaster or headmistress of Hogwarts School?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cornelius Fudge

questions.question: Timmy Martin is a TV character who had a dog named Lassie.
Which of these characters from the Harry Potter series is not a direct ancestor of Tom Marvolo Riddle, AKA Lord Voldemort?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hepzibah Smith

questions.question: Singing cowboy Roy Rogers had a horse named Trigger.
